statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 1 \\ -11 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 17 \\ 10 \\ -11 \\ 35 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
